document.full_text: the disgraced former police chief of a small new mexico border town will remain behind bars with the mayor and village trustee pending trial on gun running charges, a judge ruled on thursday.
document.title: new mexico police chief denied bail on gun charges
lines_and_colors: the disgraced former police chief of a small new mexico border town will remain behind bars with the mayor and village trustee pending trial on gun running charges, a judge ruled on thursday.
